data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Samut Sakhon to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samut Sakhon, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,744 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, teach the 2,744 believers in Samut Sakhon that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Samut Sakhon hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hindi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hindi people.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Samut Sakhon to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Samut Sakhon to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Samut Sakhon do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
